channel.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
channel.description:
I'm closing the two threads on wallpaper and moving the discussion to this thread.
Previous threads: https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,28.msg229.html https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,113.0.html
What I propose -- nay, DEMAND -- is that all those interested can propose a wallpaper for the next whonix release inside this thread. When it comes time to make the final decision, a team member will select one.
The deciding team member for Whonix 9 will be Adre. For 10, fortasse. For 11, yours truly; and so on, in order of date joined; with Adre always having veto power over the wallpaper chosen -- and any part of this process :P

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: Occq
item.description:
Has ioerror commented on this HulaHoop?

If the problem is EXIF, we just strip the EXIF.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Going the more paranoid way now:

github.com/Whonix/Whonix

Selecting only from signed wallpapers in the repos

opened 01:40AM - 09 Sep 14 UTC
closed 07:39PM - 14 Sep 14 UTC
HulaHoopWhonix

At this point you will think I'm paranoid but trust me on this one. Real world attacks have been done by...

enhancement security

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper

item.description:
New wallpapers to be first shipped in Whonix 10?

Have you talked about CC with the author, Jason?

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: JasonJAyalaP
item.description:
Hrm. I was positive that all his stuff was CC.
If you decide to go with this wallpaper, I’m certain I can get CC license from him.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
JasonJAyalaP:

How about this: We use the dark blue (no logo) and a dark metal grey by the same author -> http://malkowitch.deviantart.com/art/Minimalist-Metal-Wallpaper-335976052

I am okay with the picture, but licensing fails here. From that page in comments section:

I don't mind using it at any way except selling as stock.

Which is a non-Free term.

It’s a bit cynical to talk about licenses for single colored wallpapers, no? Anyhow. I could be ignorant, but recreating such a one colored wallpaper and donating to the public domain should not be that hard? Anyone volunteer?

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: z11
item.description:
I support Jason’s suggestions.

Maybe it would be better if the left sides were a little bit brighter but really cool wallpapers

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: JasonJAyalaP
item.description:
Hmm. I was thinking that the debian logo would be a charming homage to the technology we build upon, as well as remind users “Whonix is just debian+tor+config scripts”. However, your precaution is justified.

How about this: We use the dark blue (no logo) and a dark metal grey by the same author -> http://malkowitch.deviantart.com/art/Minimalist-Metal-Wallpaper-335976052

If Hula has a preference about which color should be WS and which GW, I’d be honored to defer to his taste. If not, blue for WS; grey (the “blander, boring” color) for GW.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
HulaHoop:

http://blog.bigou.de/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/wp-final.png

  • We need an explicit statement of authorship and license. Even if no one claims for copyright. Things being copyrighted is the default, unless a Free license is declared.
  • I am not sure the star has any implication to communism.
  • In doubt (any symbols such as the star) we could also blog about the intention to use that wallpaper to get some feedback.
  • Otherwise I wouldn’t mind. You’re on the list now to decide a later release wallpaper(s), see below.

[hr]

By the way, here is the updated vague list who will decide which wallpaper and when for discussion:

  • homosexualobster (Nominated by fortasse.) comes somewhere early.
  • Whonix 9 would be Jason (endless stream of creative consulting, docs, and more).
  • Whonix 10 Occq (testing build doc, forum activity, and more)
  • Whonix 11 Cerberus (testing build doc, forum activity, and more)
  • Whonix 12 troubadour (apparmor profiles and more)
  • MrSponsor, if interested as well comes somewhere in between.
  • Whonix 13 HulaHoop (KVM and more)

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
There is this wallpaper I really like thats inspired by cypherpunk movement. It has a similar chroma to the ones you’re discussing now with no one’s trademark on it.

http://blog.bigou.de/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/wp-final.png

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Damn it. Need to veto here. While this may be legal by license, I am quite sure Debian developers will feel offended by not making it absolutely clear, that Whonix isn’t affiliated Debian.

Can you get one without any symbols by third parties please? I am really sorry for not mentioning this!

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: JasonJAyalaP
item.description:
I went searchin’ the web, and I found something I like. CC licensed.

For workstation:
http://malkowitch.deviantart.com/art/Debian-Dark-Wallpapers-HD-1080-206870595

For gateway, same thing minus the debian logo:
http://malkowitch.deviantart.com/art/Dark-Blue-Wallpaper-394452701

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
homosexualobster:

Hello I have made many minimalistic simple wallpapers for Arch Linux and was invited over by Occq1 on reddit and I am interested in contributing in the form of a wallpaper or a few. Here are a few of my works http://imgur.com/a/IlTIX . Please let me know if you would like me to make a wallpaper for this GNU/Linux distribution. Thank you in advance , Homosexualobster

homosexualobster, fortasse just nominated you to pick wallpapers for Whonix 9.

If homosexualobster isn’t active anymore, next one in list to pick wallpaper would be Jason.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: Occq
item.description:

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: bmtkn
item.description:
Nothing changed. There isn’t much involved. You just put “Whonix is a member of the Internet Defense League (http://internetdefenseleague.org/).” on your homepage and that’s about it. Can be found here:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Main_Page#Screenshots
[/quote]

Good to hear

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
[quote=“bmtkn, post:20, topic:140”]Guys,why Whonix not a member of Internet Defence League no more?
Is it associated with some license agreements?[/quote]
Nothing changed. There isn’t much involved. You just put “Whonix is a member of the Internet Defense League (http://internetdefenseleague.org/).” on your homepage and that’s about it. Can be found here:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Main_Page#Screenshots

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: Cerberus
item.description:
For the (graphical) GW we could just use a red background (solid color) or some other “visual alert” of some kind. Originally, I thought about using the WS wallpaper with some red frame around it, but that isn’t really feasible considering different resolutions & wallpaper scaling/zooming.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
@homosexualobster, would you be willing to refine a few existing graphics in meanwhile? Could you look into

  • https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,209.0.html
    please?

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: Occq
item.description:
We should be able to get two different designs done every 6 months (guessing time between major releases).

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Another idea to avoid double work: the gateway sticks to the same wallpaper for multiple versions.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: JasonJAyalaP
item.description:
Having two separate images might mean more work for the chooser, and in the case of a custom wallpaper, asking a contributor to do double work. Maybe it’s not a big deal.

Alternatively, the gateway desktop could be the same as the workstation but black and white or inverted colors! Maybe not the most artistic choice, but users would be instantly alerted that “this one is the different one you’re not supposed to trust”.

And that gateway notice message is just god-awful.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix 9 Wallpaper
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I think it would be better to have two different wallpapers. Otherwise confusing one desktop with the other is at risk. Also that notice on Whonix-Gateway should not be omitted, at least not by default. (Once you understand it, what you around here certainly did, feel free to change.)

Read full topic
